metadata.title: CVE-2022-47185 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Improper input validation vulnerability on the range header in ApacheSoftware Foundation Apache Traffic Server.This issue affects Apache TrafficServer: through 9.2.1.

criterions.comment: trafficserver: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
